review: It's a cool device and I like it a lot. I'd give it a 5 star rating, but I'm one of those people that has to really be wowed to do that. I bought one for my daughter when they first came out and she loves it. I highly recommend this. My tv has everything I want...and then some.

review: Fire Stick is sooo much better than trying to deal with ordering your shows through Google Chromecast. For a few more $'s you get a dedicated remote and the screen and start up is also much easier! Love it!
author: lilyocean

review: Better than my WDTV Live or my Samsung Smart DVD player.Sets up easily (except you have to listen to the Amazon Prime commercial).  Stays connected to my WiFi network.I use it mostly for Pandora so can't speak to the movie apps.Has a most recent list so you can get to your preferred apps quickly.  On the Samsung you have five preferred apps that you have to add to.  Old WD TV Live didn't have either.Also has some very nice screen savers when you pause an app for more than a couple minutes.And the price is competitive with all the others out there.
